column5: parachute at the end...
They're not showing that part until the manufacture finds some more suckers to buy suits Doug ! lol  First few guys... kinda hard on the ski budget !
Your not thinking of a new hobby are ya bud?  They almost look like those flying monkeys dont they. Very cool.
Thanks douG... that was awesome
I think we may be in trouble if a rocket scientist cant solve this riddle.....
I SO wish I had the guts to try that
Lead Zeppelin if I tried it!
Yeah, thanks a lot. Now I have to keep swallowing just to keep my sphincter from popping outa my mouth.  JF
Dang now that was wild...thanks for sharing...AWESOME, too bad I'm too old and chicken for that crap.
How do they land?  Its simple...just make like a goose and stick the feet out.
You go first.LOL
Exactly Brian... if Kemper can get that "delta wing" nose high enough to get his feet down before the airfoil stalls.... I wanna watch that one !!!

There is actually a guy i saw on some program that tried to fly under a bridge before landing with another guy flying just over the bridge, the one guy, hit the bridge and died instantly. The one that lived, is in the process of trying to design a landing ramp and is going to try and land without a parachute and land on this ramp like a water slide and slide to a stop. THe guy said he was suicidal and tried to commit suicide a few times (not by flying).......until he found the sport of .....well, whatever this is called. And it made him feel alive, and worth living again, and if he died doing it, well........he wouldnt care because this is what prevented him from killing himself anyway.

Alright already, I see the little knapsack on the back, and also saw someone at the beginning of the clip under a parasail.  I would still like to see the chute deploy part of the flight.  And another thing, I still really dislike those flyin monkeys.
If I was goin' to take up huntin' again... it'd be for those damn flyin' monkeys!!!
Flying squirrels. http://ca.youtube.com/watch?v=_ZgcBUx0Vwg
I'm just thinking of the SPLAT if Buddy got too close to the cliff side.  PANCAKE.  Its one thing to do it, But the guy that tries it first, just unbelievable.
They looked like monkeys   Thanks for that. HC
Wow thx for that clip. That looks awesome. Takes a real set of ...... to pull that off.
Pretty cool.   I wonder how far you could get if you jumped off the CN tower?   Could I get home?  Would sure beat driving.
Thank DoUg,  Any way to reduce my commute to the salt mines is appreciated.       Aw,..to be young again.......
